content: try out this crochet mini book pattern link to video https //youtu be/sdxrg3i6ick skill level easy format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet back loop front loop tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium -red and white -yarn needle -scissors final size - height is 2 cm width is 3 cm length is 4 cm
